text: ohu surya udavana (nægenahira) disava at kara gat avasthavedi samahara janatava kerehi suryaya uda vi (ovun pitatehi) sitimada dutuveya. ovuntada suryayatada atare api kisima badhakayak æti kale næta. (ovun ændum hænda ho nivasayan idi kara ho surya rasmiya adu kara gata hæki gnanaya nomæti janatavak vasayen sitiyaha)
